alert.note: Alert for Chase; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 07 at 6:27PM CDT until June 07 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Perkins County in southwestern Nebraska... Northwestern Chase County in southwestern Nebraska... * Until 615 PM MDT. * At 527 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Venango, or 13 miles southeast of Julesburg, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Imperial, Venango, Lamar, Crete, Chase, Brandon and Wanamaker State Wildfire Management Area. This includes Highway 61 between mile markers 43 and 59. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
